title: Solomon’s Officials and Wisdom
summary: Solomon establishes a structured administration with officials and regional governors. Israel enjoys peace and prosperity. Solomon’s wisdom surpasses that of all others, and people from many nations come to hear him.

faq.question: What was life like under Solomon’s rule?
faq.answer: There was peace, prosperity, and stability across Israel.

faq.question: How great was Solomon’s wisdom?
faq.answer: It surpassed that of all the wise men of the east and Egypt, and he was widely renowned.
